column4: How to remove a program that was installed with .deb but it is not listed in Synaptic or in Add/Remove ?
are you sure it's not there? it should be
the package name is yafaray_0.1.1_ubuntu64.deb and in Synaptic i have only Yafray and it's not even installed and it is a different version
if you look at synaptic, in the bottom left corner there are different buttons, you might find what you search from there
